mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "From the Floor", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Round Dancing-Its History-And Remarks by Forrest and Kay Richards", "Homes for Square Dancing Powder Mill Barn", "National Square Dance Convention", "Allemande Maybe, by Jane Clausen", "Gems from Other Publications", "Overseas Dateline", "The Dancers' Walkthru", "Ladies on the Square: Tips For Fit", "Style Series: More on Wheel and Deal", "Americana: Pick a Bale O'Cotton, by Terry Golden", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "The Caller of the Month: Tommy Cavanagh", "Paging the Roundancers; Henri Molaison", and "Experimental Lab: Curlique".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
